DataElement.preferredDefinition: the yes/no indicator that asks whether the patient has a history of significant bleeding episodes.

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: information relating to patient history hemorrhage event.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A person who requires medical care.

Concepts.definition: A person who receives medical attention, care, or treatment, or who is registered with medical professional or institution with the purpose to receive medical care when necessary.

Something that happens at a given place and time.

ReferenceDocuments.name: Does patient have history of
ReferenceDocuments.description: Does patient have history of significant bleeding episodes

ReferenceDocuments.name: CRF Text
ReferenceDocuments.description: Were there any hemorrhage events during this report period

ReferenceDocuments.name: CRF Text1
ReferenceDocuments.description: Has the patient had any significant non-traumatic bleeding within 6 months before study entry?

ReferenceDocuments.name: CRF Text4
ReferenceDocuments.description: Has the patient had any significant bleeding that is not related to the primary CRC tumor within the past 180 days?

ReferenceDocuments.name: COG CRF TEXT 1
ReferenceDocuments.description: In the opinion of the treating physician, did this patient experience clinically significant hemorrhage/bleeding event(s)?

ReferenceDocuments.name: PBTC_Text1
ReferenceDocuments.description: Patient has a known coagulopathy or a first degree family member with a known coagulopathy?

ReferenceDocuments.name: NRG CRF_Text 2
ReferenceDocuments.description: Does the patient have clinically significant bleeding within 4 weeks of registration?

ReferenceDocuments.name: NRG CRF_Text 1
ReferenceDocuments.description: Clinically significant bleeding within 4 weeks of registration?

ReferenceDocuments.name: NRG CRF_Text 3
ReferenceDocuments.description: Did the patient have clinically significant bleeding within 4 weeks of registration?

ReferenceDocuments.name: CRF Text6
ReferenceDocuments.description: Clinically significant hematuria, hematemesis, or hemoptysis, or other history of significant bleeding?

ReferenceDocuments.name: CRF Text5
ReferenceDocuments.description: Prior significant bleeding event(s) or bleeding diathesis?

ReferenceDocuments.name: CRF Text7
ReferenceDocuments.description: Evidence of Hemorrhage After Treatment of CNS Metastases

ReferenceDocuments.name: NRG CRF_Text 4
ReferenceDocuments.description: Does the patient have any hemorrhage or bleeding event Grade greater than or equal to 3 within 28 days prior to registration?
